survey_name: Outdoor Recreation Participation and Preferences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand participation rates, preferences, and barriers related to outdoor recreational activities among adults.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in outdoor recreational activities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in outdoor recreational activities?

questions.question_text: Which of the following outdoor activities do you enjoy? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following outdoor activities do you enjoy? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors most influence your choice of outdoor recreational activities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format with an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors most influence your choice of outdoor recreational activities?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in outdoor recreational activities more often?
answer_options: Lack of access to suitable locations
Lack of knowledge about available activities
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in outdoor recreational activities more often?
answer_options: Lack of access to suitable locations

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving access to outdoor recreational activities in your community?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback.
